title: In the Matter of Illumina/GRAIL
description: The FTC filed an administrative complaint to block Illumina's $7.1 billion proposed acquisition of life sciences company GRAIL, alleging the deal would diminish innovation in the U.S. market for multi-cancer early detection tests.

title: Epic Games v. Apple
description: Epic Games sued Apple alleging antitrust violations concerning the App Store's policies, specifically the 30% cut on in-app purchases and the prevention of third-party app stores on iOS.
